actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970.
short_title: Federal Railroad Safety Authorization Act of 1985

summary.text: Federal Railroad Safety Authorization Act of 1985 - Amends the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to authorize appropriations for FY 1986 and 1987. Confers jurisdiction upon district courts to issue orders requiring immediate compliance with a subpoena or directive issued by the Secretary of Transportation against an entity which is located or doing business within such district court's jurisdiction.

titles.title: Federal Railroad Safety Authorization Act of 1985
A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970.
